alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON... SOUTHEASTERN GREENSVILLE AND SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Halifax, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Seaboard around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mud Castle, Boones Crossroads, Pleasant Grove, Pleasant Hill, Margarettsville, Gumberry, Branchville, Bryants Corner, Jackson, and Galatia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
